Articles.Content:
Wernher Von Kerman sat in his office staring at the clock. He was waiting for the call that could change kerbin forever. Suddenly, the phone rang, "Hello" said Wernher. "Wernher this is the president your program is a go but there is one condition, I want no deaths. And so began the Kerbal Space Agency, they had an almost unlimited budget, but if even one kerbal dies the whole program is shut down forever.

Edited May 3, 2014 by cwheels32
